name: colwayexpedition
description: A modern travel and trekking expedition booking platform built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). Travelor-Go allows users to explore exciting trekking destinations, book expeditions, and connect with the travel community.

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
